option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:elevation="4dp" android:padding="18dp" android:radius="10dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:descendantFocusability="afterDescendants"> <!-- allow children to get focus first -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCustomerName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Customer: " android:paddingTop="10dp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackQty" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sacks: " />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvServices" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Services: " />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSchedule" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_schedule_owner" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPickupLocation" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pickup Location: " android:visibility="visible" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDeliveryLocation" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Delivery Location: " android:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Current Status TextView --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvCurrentStatus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Current Status: " android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#3F51B5" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Divider below current status --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#CCCCCC" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/rgStatusOptions" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:focusable="true" android:focusableInTouchMode="true"> <!-- ensure group can handle focus in touch mode -->
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbDpickup" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Delivery Boy Pickup" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbCDropoff" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Waiting for Customer Drop Off" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbPending" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pending" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbProcessing" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Processing" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbOutForDelivery" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Out for Delivery" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbCPickup" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Waiting for Customer Pickup" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" /> </RadioGroup>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSubmit" android:layout_gravity="right" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Submit" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"/>
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:elevation="4dp" android:padding="12dp" android:radius="10dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:descendantFocusability="afterDescendants" android:paddingStart="4dp" android:paddingEnd="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCustomerName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_customer" android:paddingTop="6dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackQty" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_sacks" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvServices" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_services" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSchedule" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_schedule_owner" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPickupLocation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_pickup_location" android:visibility="visible" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDeliveryLocation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_delivery_location" android:visibility="visible" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<!-- Current Status TextView --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvCurrentStatus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_status" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#3F51B5" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:gravity="start" android:padding="2dp" />
<!-- Divider below current status --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#DDDDDD" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" />
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/rgStatusOptions" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:focusable="true" android:focusableInTouchMode="true" android:paddingStart="4dp" android:paddingEnd="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <!-- ensure group can handle focus in touch mode -->
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbDpickup" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_delivery_boy_pickup" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbCDropoff" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_waiting_customer_dropoff" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbPending" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_pending" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbProcessing" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_processing" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbOutForDelivery" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_out_for_delivery" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbCPickup" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/rb_waiting_customer_pickup" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" /> </RadioGroup>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSubmit" android:layout_gravity="end" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/submit" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".owner.OwnerMainActivity">
<TextView android:id="@+id/trackFragment" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Track" android:textSize="24sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.045" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.022" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewOwnerTrack" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:paddingLeft="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingRight="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="45dp" tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="40dp" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".owner.OwnerMainActivity">
<TextView android:id="@+id/trackFragment" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/title_track" android:textSize="24sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewOwnerTrack" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/trackFragment" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Capstone</string> <!-- TODO: Remove or change this placeholder text --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> <string name="title_activity_login">LoginActivity</string> <string name="prompt_email">Email</string> <string name="prompt_password">Password</string> <string name="action_sign_in">Sign in or register</string> <string name="action_sign_in_short">Sign in</string> <string name="welcome">"Welcome !"</string> <string name="invalid_username">Not a valid username</string> <string name="invalid_password">Password must be >5 characters</string> <string name="login_failed">"Login failed"</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_open">Open navigation drawer</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_close">Close navigation drawer</string>
<!-- Labels for customer track item --> <string name="label_request_id">Request ID:</string> <string name="label_date_requested">Date Requested:</string> <string name="label_status">Status:</string> <string name="more">More</string> <string name="mark_as_complete">Mark as Complete</string>
<!-- Formatted strings (use these in code to avoid concatenation) --> <string name="request_id_format">Request ID: %1$d</string> <string name="date_requested_format">Date Requested: %1$s</string> <string name="sack_qty_format">Sack Quantity: %1$d</string> <string name="service_format">Service: %1$s</string> <string name="pickup_location_format">Pickup Location: %1$s</string> <string name="delivery_location_format">Delivery Location: %1$s</string> <string name="status_format">Status: %1$s</string>
<!-- Dialog labels --> <string name="request_details_title">Request Details</string> <string name="label_customer">Customer:</string> <string name="label_sacks">Sacks:</string> <string name="label_services">Services:</string> <string name="label_schedule">Pickup Schedule:</string> <string name="label_pickup_location">Pickup Location:</string> <string name="label_delivery_location">Delivery Location:</string> <string name="label_comment">Comment:</string> <string name="label_submitted_at">Submitted At:</string> <string name="label_progress">Progress:</string>
<string name="customer_format">Customer: %1$s</string> <string name="sacks_format">Sacks: %1$d</string> <string name="services_format">Services: %1$s</string> <string name="schedule_format">Pickup Schedule: %1$s</string> <!-- Owner track uses a shorter label 'Schedule:' per request --> <string name="label_schedule_owner">Schedule:</string> <string name="schedule_format_owner">Schedule: %1$s</string> <string name="comment_format">Comment: %1$s</string> <string name="submitted_at_format">Submitted At: %1$s</string> <string name="close">Close</string>
<!-- Progress --> <string name="progress_format">Progress: %1$d%%</string>
<!-- Customer profile strings --> <string name="nav_home">Home</string> <string name="nav_request">Request</string> <string name="nav_track">Track</string> <string name="nav_history">History</string> <string name="nav_profile">Profile</string> <string name="nav_logout">Logout</string>
<string name="profile_title">Profile</string> <string name="hint_first_name">First name</string> <string name="hint_last_name">Last name</string> <string name="hint_email">Email address</string> <string name="hint_contact">Contact number</string> <string name="hint_address">Home address</string> <string name="action_save">Save</string> <string name="change_password_title">Change password</string> <string name="hint_old_password">Old password</string> <string name="hint_new_password">New password</string> <string name="action_change_password">Change password</string>
<!-- Profile labels (extracted) --> <string name="label_first_name">First name:</string> <string name="label_last_name">Last name:</string> <string name="label_email">Email:</string> <string name="label_contact">Contact number:</string> <string name="label_address">Home address:</string>
<!-- Validation messages --> <string name="error_first_name_required">Please enter your first name</string> <string name="error_last_name_required">Please enter your last name</string> <string name="error_contact_required">Please enter your 11-digit contact number</string> <string name="error_contact_invalid">Contact must be 11 digits</string> <string name="error_address_required">Please enter your home address</string> <string name="error_new_password_short">New password must be at least 8 characters</string> <string name="saving_profile">Saving...</string> <string name="saving_password">Updating password...</string>
<!-- New password confirmation --> <string name="hint_new_password_confirm">Confirm new password</string> <string name="error_password_mismatch">Passwords do not match</string> <string name="error_old_password_required">Please enter your current password</string> <string name="not_set">Not set</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Capstone</string> <!-- TODO: Remove or change this placeholder text --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> <string name="title_activity_login">LoginActivity</string> <string name="prompt_email">Email</string> <string name="prompt_password">Password</string> <string name="action_sign_in">Sign in or register</string> <string name="action_sign_in_short">Sign in</string> <string name="welcome">"Welcome !"</string> <string name="invalid_username">Not a valid username</string> <string name="invalid_password">Password must be >5 characters</string> <string name="login_failed">"Login failed"</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_open">Open navigation drawer</string> <string name="navigation_drawer_close">Close navigation drawer</string>
<!-- Labels for customer track item --> <string name="label_request_id">Request ID:</string> <string name="label_date_requested">Date Requested:</string> <string name="label_status">Status:</string> <string name="more">More</string> <string name="mark_as_complete">Mark as Complete</string>
<!-- Formatted strings (use these in code to avoid concatenation) --> <string name="request_id_format">Request ID: %1$d</string> <string name="date_requested_format">Date Requested: %1$s</string> <string name="sack_qty_format">Sack Quantity: %1$d</string> <string name="service_format">Service: %1$s</string> <string name="pickup_location_format">Pickup Location: %1$s</string> <string name="delivery_location_format">Delivery Location: %1$s</string> <string name="status_format">Status: %1$s</string>
<!-- Dialog labels --> <string name="request_details_title">Request Details</string> <string name="label_customer">Customer:</string> <string name="label_sacks">Sacks:</string> <string name="label_services">Services:</string> <string name="label_schedule">Pickup Schedule:</string> <string name="label_pickup_location">Pickup Location:</string> <string name="label_delivery_location">Delivery Location:</string> <string name="label_comment">Comment:</string> <string name="label_submitted_at">Submitted At:</string> <string name="label_progress">Progress:</string>
<string name="customer_format">Customer: %1$s</string> <string name="sacks_format">Sacks: %1$d</string> <string name="services_format">Services: %1$s</string> <string name="schedule_format">Pickup Schedule: %1$s</string> <!-- Owner track uses a shorter label 'Schedule:' per request --> <string name="label_schedule_owner">Schedule:</string> <string name="schedule_format_owner">Schedule: %1$s</string> <string name="comment_format">Comment: %1$s</string> <string name="submitted_at_format">Submitted At: %1$s</string> <string name="close">Close</string>
<!-- Progress --> <string name="progress_format">Progress: %1$d%%</string>
<!-- Customer profile strings --> <string name="nav_home">Home</string> <string name="nav_request">Request</string> <string name="nav_track">Track</string> <string name="nav_history">History</string> <string name="nav_profile">Profile</string> <string name="nav_logout">Logout</string>
<string name="profile_title">Profile</string> <string name="hint_first_name">First name</string> <string name="hint_last_name">Last name</string> <string name="hint_email">Email address</string> <string name="hint_contact">Contact number</string> <string name="hint_address">Home address</string> <string name="action_save">Save</string> <string name="change_password_title">Change password</string> <string name="hint_old_password">Old password</string> <string name="hint_new_password">New password</string> <string name="action_change_password">Change password</string>
<!-- Profile labels (extracted) --> <string name="label_first_name">First name:</string> <string name="label_last_name">Last name:</string> <string name="label_email">Email:</string> <string name="label_contact">Contact number:</string> <string name="label_address">Home address:</string>
<!-- Validation messages --> <string name="error_first_name_required">Please enter your first name</string> <string name="error_last_name_required">Please enter your last name</string> <string name="error_contact_required">Please enter your 11-digit contact number</string> <string name="error_contact_invalid">Contact must be 11 digits</string> <string name="error_address_required">Please enter your home address</string> <string name="error_new_password_short">New password must be at least 8 characters</string> <string name="saving_profile">Saving…</string> <string name="saving_password">Updating password…</string>
<!-- New password confirmation --> <string name="hint_new_password_confirm">Confirm new password</string> <string name="error_password_mismatch">Passwords do not match</string> <string name="error_old_password_required">Please enter your current password</string> <string name="not_set">Not set</string>
<!-- Labels used in owner track item layout --> <string name="rb_delivery_boy_pickup">Delivery Boy Pickup</string> <string name="rb_waiting_customer_dropoff">Waiting for Customer Drop Off</string> <string name="rb_pending">Pending</string> <string name="rb_processing">Processing</string> <string name="rb_out_for_delivery">Out for Delivery</string> <string name="rb_waiting_customer_pickup">Waiting for Customer Pickup</string> <string name="submit">Submit</string>
<!-- Add title string used in owner fragment --> <string name="title_track">Track</string> </resources>
